thread.title: UPSC IFS Prelims exam 2015 result declared, check upsc.gov.in
thread.title_full: UPSC IFS Prelims exam 2015 result declared, check upsc.gov.in | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: UPSC IFS Prelims exam 2015 result declared, check upsc.gov.in
text:
Other Articles TCS: Tame numbers eclipse good OPM Fe exclusive: IVRCL to get new owners as banks ready to invoke SDR Flipkart sells 1-mn products in 10 hours despite glitch UPSC IFS Prelims exam result: Union Public Service Commission on Tuesday declared the result of Indian Forest Service (Prelims) 2015.
Candidates who have cleared the Prelims written examination are now eligible to appear in Indian Forest Service Exam (Main) 2015. For the main exam, candidates need to fill the Detailed Application Form (DAF) and submit is by October 28.
Detailed Application Form (DAF) for IFoS (Main) Examination, 2015 are available on upsc.gov.in from October 16 to October 28. Fee for the exam will also be paid online.
Once the form is submitted online, candidates have to send a printed copy of the DAF duly signed in ink by the candidates along with all relevant documents wherever applicable to the Under Secretary [(IFoS], Union Public Service Commission, Dholpur House, Shahjahan Road, New Delhi-110069. The firm should reach the Commission’s Office latest by 03-11-2015.
The envelope containing the DAF should be addressed to ‘Application for Indian Forest Service (Main) Examination,
2015.” It can also be delivered at Union Public Service Commission counter by hand till 03-11-2015 (05.00 P.M.).
“It may be noted that mere submission of application form does not, ipso facto, confer on any right for admission to the Main Examination. The admission certificate along with the time table of the Main Examination will be uploaded on the Commission’s website for the eligible candidates 2-3 weeks before the commencement of the examination,” reads the notice on UPSC website.
 13, 2015 3:42 pm © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
